statuslineBannerobject

browser.t[810]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

The basic status line window. The “banner” in the name is historical, because the traditional console UI implements the status line as a banner window. We don’t actually have banner windows in the Web UI; we use iframes instead. But we keep the name to make it easier to port games written for the traditional UI to the Web UI.

transient statuslineBanner :   WebStatusWin WebBannerWin
